sentences.en: It is important that we dovetail our respective interests.
sentences.cn: 我们寻求各自利益共同点是重要的。

sentences.en: The happy couple and their respective parents took to the floor.
sentences.cn: 那幸福的一对和他们各自的父母开始跳起舞来。

sentences.en: They are each recognized specialists in their respective fields.
sentences.cn: 他们在各自的领域都被视为专家。
